Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering its worth to us, we propose a price of $14000 for this exceptional item. We believe this price reflects its true value while providing you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
